feat: Major enhancements to Wiley Widget application

≡ƒÄ» Core Functionality Updates:
- Fixed EnterpriseViewModelTests IsLoading state issues
- Corrected UtilityCustomer ordering in repository tests
- Fixed search count expectations in UtilityCustomer tests
- Enhanced test coverage and reliability

≡ƒÅù∩╕Å New Features & Models:
- Added MunicipalAccount and UtilityCustomer entities with full CRUD
- Implemented new database migrations for municipal accounts
- Created comprehensive repository pattern for new entities
- Added AI conversation and assistance features
- Integrated WhatIf scenario engine for advanced calculations

≡ƒôè Repository Analysis Tools:
- Created enhanced fetchable repository indexing script with parallel processing
- Added intelligent caching and rate limiting for GitHub API calls
- Implemented retry logic with exponential backoff
- Generated comprehensive repository metadata and statistics
- Added progress indicators and detailed error handling

≡ƒº¬ Testing Infrastructure:
- Added extensive test coverage for new models and services
- Created integration tests for municipal account operations
- Added UI tests for conversation and AI features
- Enhanced test project configurations and dependencies

≡ƒöº Technical Improvements:
- Updated project configurations and package references
- Enhanced VS Code settings and launch configurations
- Improved build and deployment configurations
- Added comprehensive error handling and logging

≡ƒôê Performance & Quality:
- Implemented parallel processing for better performance
- Added caching mechanisms to reduce API calls
- Enhanced error handling and retry mechanisms
- Improved code organization and maintainability

Files changed: 80+ including new models, services, tests, and tools
All tests passing with enhanced coverage and reliability

recent_commits.author: bigessfour
recent_commits.message:
Fix test project RuntimeIdentifier issues

- Removed win7-x64 RuntimeIdentifier from test projects
- Allows tests to run on any Windows runtime in CI environment
- Should resolve test execution failures in GitHub Actions
- Maintains compatibility with .NET 8.0 target framework

recent_commits.author: bigessfour
recent_commits.message:
Fix CI/CD workflow .NET version mismatch

- Corrected .NET version from 9.0.x to 8.0.x in ci-new.yml and release-new.yml
- Aligned with global.json specification (8.0.413) and project target framework (net8.0-windows)
- Updated release notes template to reflect correct .NET version
- This should resolve the CI build failures
